dimensions: Warp x Weft: 10.3 x 7 cm (4 1/16 x 2 3/4 in.)
title: Mrs. Frances Tucker Montresor (c. 1778) by John Singleton Copley (1738-1815)
description: Woven souvenir based on the painting 'Mrs. Frances Tucker Montresor' (ca. 1778) by John Singleton Copley (1738-1815). "W.W.L. CO. 1967 DEL. H.H." appears below the portrait. Blue, red, golden-yellow, gray, and black on white warp.
name: Souvenir ribbon portrait
